thread.title: Another Excellent Stay!
thread.title_full: Another Excellent Stay! - Review of Millennium Broadway New York Times Square, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: mockx3
title: Another Excellent Stay!
text:
Up to NYC to see Bette Midler in Hello Dolly - booked this hotel because of previous excellent stay, and close to everything Broadway.
Arrived to find the room smelling damp - called down to the desk, who immediately changed the room. Great service there!
The new room, however, didn't have a shower curtain! What would someone want with a shower curtain? Called down to the desk, and problem immediately fixed.
Housekeeping was wonderful, front desk was wonderful, concierge was wonderful - gave easy directions to what we were looking for - even asked how the show was when we returned from Hello Dolly!
Would STRONGLY recommend this hotel for location, comfort, safety, and friendliness.
